text: "Massachusetts" is a 1967 song. It was written by Barry, Maurice and Robin Gibb. It was performed by Bee Gees. The band released a single from their fourth studio album Horizontal and went to number 1 in the United Kingdom, New Zealand, Germany, Austria, Belgium, the Netherlands, Japan, Sweden and South Africa, number 11 in the United States and number 2 in Switzerland, Australia, Ireland, Denmark and Canada. == References == Category:1967 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Bee Gees songs
title: Massachusetts (Bee Gees song)
